text: Piotr Tobolski (born 11 May 1958) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:People from Gniezno
title: Piotr Tobolski
